testcase.name: To validate the invaid username and Invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given User enter in the login page..........................................passed When User give invalid "nfdn" and "234".....................................passed And User click the login button.............................................passed Then User should be in invalid credentials page.............................passed

testcase.name: To validate login functionality without entering login credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User enter in the login page..........................................passed When User click the login button without entering any login credentials.....passed Then User should be in invalid credentials page.............................passed

testcase.classname: To validate the forgot passsword functionality
testcase.name: To To validate searching the account using mobile number when user forgets password
